item.title: How to comeback and win in life
item.description: First of all, let’s talk about the definition of the word comeback shall we? Comeback: a return to a former higher rank, popularity, position, prosperity, etc.

item.title: Why minimalism is important in your life
item.description: This is my first (and not last) blogpost talking about life advice and my opinions so just buckle up and enjoy the ride!
